name: Schrodinger's Cat Conundrum
description:
When a cat isn't observed in a box, they can be both alive and dead at the same time. Only issue is, no one thought about how hard it is to be both! Now Mittens has to make sure she gets back out of this weird quantum world.

Made using Unity for TriJam 170: Life in a Box in 6 hours.

CONTROLS:
WASD to move
Space to jump
Esc to pause and switch modes

CREDITS
Sprite work, Code, and Design: NickP
Music: Floating Also - William Rosati Listen to it here!
Sound effects made with https://sfxr.me/
